title: 1 Inch Alphabet Letter Stencils for Painting - 70 Pack Letter and Number Stencil Templates with Signs for Painting on Wood, Reusable Alphabet and Numbers Stencils for Chalkboard Wood Signs & Wall Art
features: ☆ COMPLETE SET OF LETTER STENCILS: There are 70 pack stencils in this stencil templates set, 26 uppercase letters, 26 lowercase letters, 10 numbers, and 8 most common signs. Complete set of letter and number stencils for wood signs, chalkboard signs, scrabble tiles, wall art decorations, etc. They are designed to serve as reusable stencil templates, which can meet your needs to show your personalized and unique creativity at all times.

☆ EASY TO USE: These stencils can save you a lot of time when creating crafts, you can customize words and numbers to create any art projects you want. You just put them on the surface of the object, paint with a brush or spray with a spray gun, simply do it! They are reusable, easy to clean with soap and water. The reasonable size is easy to store. Size: stencil 2.2"x 2.2", letter height: uppercase letter about 1", lowercase letter about 0.75".

☆ PREMIUM QUALITY: To ensure the flexibility and durability of the stencil, all stencil templates are made of premium quality mylar material, which are washable, reusable, tear resistant and not easy to damage. They are easy to clean with soap and water. Laser cut, no sharp edge, they are safe for children. Although made of durable materials, but they are very thin to make sure they fit the wood or walls better when you use them, which will make your artistic creation more standard and natural.

☆ WIDE RANGE OF APPLICATIONS: This letter and number stencil templates set is made of durable and flexible PET material, it has smooth surface allowing you to apply them on most flat surface: wood, paper, fabric, canvas, glass, metal, rock, tiles, floors, furniture, walls, etc. Complete set of letters and numbers to meet your artistic creativity at any time. They are great for wood signs, posters, invitations, t shirts, advertising, packaging, home decorations, party decorations and more.

☆ PERFECT GIFT IDEA: You can also give it as a gift to your friends, colleagues, classmates, and neighbors. Of course, if you can give your friends a perfect finished art craft, it will be a great surprise!
description: The Advantages of Our 1 Inch Letter Stencils:

☑ Unique Designs & Calligraphy Style ☑ Complete Set of Letters and Numbers ☑ Easy to Use & Removed ☑ Tear Resistant & Washable ☑ Reusable, Easy to Clean & Store ☑ Quality Eco Friendly PET Materials ☑ Laser Cut, No Sharp Edge, Safe for Children ☑ Premium Quality, Not Easy to Get out of Shape ☑ Wide Range of Applications, Suitable for Most Flat Surface ☑ Cut from Durable & Flexible 10 Mil Mylar Sheets, Smooth Surface

This letter and number stencil templates set is made of durable and flexible PET material, it has smooth surface allowing you to apply them on most flat surface. They are great for wood signs, cookies, scrapbooking, advertising, packaging, cards making, party decorations and more.

These stencils can save you a lot of time when creating crafts, you can customize words and numbers to create any art projects you want. You just need to put them on flat objects, paint with a brush or spray with a spray gun, simply do it!
Any smooth and clean area is suitable for stencil painting. The rougher the surface, the harder it is to get clean, clear lines while painting. Use a brush or spray gun to get the best stencil art.
